Html: is Office Api supported in mono c#

You can compile your solution at development time with NetOffice without worries even with Mono. But at runtime you need an MS-Office version to success.
BUT Mono is a - Linux <3 - framework and MS-Office is not available here. (i'm not sure i understand your question)
If you want only create and edit office documents - you can do this with some other great projects available here on - Codeplex <3 - and there works fine in Mono.

*Sebastian
